title: Replace missing payment QR asset with uploaded PhonePe QR and ensure it is served from the existing production path

requirements.summary: Replace the Payment Section QR static asset at the existing public path with the uploaded PhonePe QR image so it loads reliably in production builds.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` exists in the repo after the change and its contents match the user-uploaded `image-5.png` (no visual transformations besides normal responsive rendering in the browser).
In the Payment Section, the QR image renders (the onError fallback does not trigger) when navigating to the payment step.
The QR image is available at runtime at the exact URL path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` in the deployed build.

file_operations.description: Add (or replace, if present) the static QR image asset so it exactly matches the uploaded `image-5.png` bytes while keeping the existing filename and location. This ensures the app continues to load it from `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` in production builds.
